title: Vegetarian Buffet
description: Name in Chinese is 本草人生. Address is 苏州高新区塔园路117号. Enter through a shop selling vegetarian food. Quiet, pleasant, upscale atmosphere located on second floor. Area for group dining available on third floor. Very large buffet. Staff speak a little English and will advise which dishes are vegan. Previously located on Binhe Road, Aug 2014. Nearest metro station: Yushan Road (line 1).
